page.title: 08EMPLOYMENT
page.content: Goat Husbandry This Goat Farm comprised 15 acres giving employment to both husband and wife as yet no other employees It is intended to be run as a business selling goat products directly to the consumer at the farm gate Several properties in the whole area sell their home grown produce at the gate ranging from very sofisticated shop style buildings to a table with a cardboard box for the money Agricultural Contracting This covers the supply of tractors for cultivations combine harvesters balers excavators and earthmoving equipment which gives seasonal work to several local people and provides an excellent service for the farming community helping small farmers to avoid the cost of buying expensive machinery
